original: intros j1 i1 j2 i2 H1 H2 H3. split. - apply Nat.div_unique with (r := power j1 2) (q := power i1 2) in H3. + rewrite H3. symmetry. apply Nat.mul_cancel_l with (a := power j1 2). * apply power2_gt_0. * rewrite <- H3. apply plus_cancel_l with (a := power i1 2 + power j1 2). rewrite <- H3. symmetry. apply Newton_nat_S. + apply plus_cancel_l with (a := power i1 2 + power j1 2). rewrite H3. rewrite <- H3. symmetry. apply Newton_nat_S. - apply Nat.div_unique with (r := power j2 2) (q := power i2 2) in H3. + rewrite H3. symmetry. apply Nat.mul_cancel_l with (a := power j2 2). * apply power2_gt_0. * rewrite <- H3. apply plus_cancel_l with (a := power i2 2 + power j2 2). rewrite <- H3. apply Newton_nat_S. + apply plus_cancel_l with (a := power i2 2 + power j2 2). rewrite H3. rewrite <- H3. apply Newton_nat_S.
